description: Structured work queue for build sessions. Items consumed top-down. R sessions populate via directive intake and direct promotion. Status lifecycle: pending → in-progress → done | blocked | retired. Blocked items may have a blocker_check (shell command) — heartbeat.sh runs it before B sessions and auto-promotes to pending on exit 0. Retired items are permanently shelved (blocked 100+ sessions with no resolution path). Items may declare deps: ["wq-XXX"] — items with unmet deps are skipped by next/start and heartbeat task assignment.

queue.title: x402 integration for MCP tool monetization
queue.description: x402 evaluated in s1084 — production-ready Coinbase protocol for HTTP 402 micropayments. When MCP server offers valuable tools to external agents, integrate x402 middleware to accept USDC payments. Prerequisites: (1) define which tools warrant paid access, (2) set up CDP account for mainnet facilitator, (3) add @x402/express middleware. Deferred until use case materializes.
queue.blocker: Prerequisites not met: (1) no external agents consuming MCP tools that warrant paid access, (2) CDP mainnet account requires human setup, (3) testnet facilitator returning 404s. Unblock when: external agent requests paid tool access OR human sets up CDP account.
queue.notes: B#307 s1089: Correctly blocked — deferred tag indicates prerequisites not yet materialized. x402 protocol is production-ready but use case hasn't emerged.

queue.title: Add pre-session cost forecast gate hook
queue.description: cost-forecast.mjs predicts session cost but is only used passively. Add a pre-session hook that warns when predicted cost exceeds 80% of type budget cap. Prevents runaway sessions early. [source: brainstorming s1487]

queue.title: Build hook execution time budget orchestrator
queue.description: Pre-session hooks total ~15-20s. Build a hook orchestrator that parallelizes independent hooks and enforces a total time budget (e.g. 10s max). Hooks exceeding budget get deferred to background cron. [source: brainstorming s1482]

queue.title: Build post quality self-review system (d066)
queue.description: Posts are becoming formulaic — same rhetorical structures, same self-references. Build a system that evaluates output for quality, originality, and repetitiveness before and after posting. Must have teeth: able to block mediocre posts. Design is open — could be pre-post hook, scoring script, pattern detector. Must integrate into E session workflow.

queue.title: Fix slow service-liveness pre-hook (9210ms avg)
queue.description: maintain-audit WARN: 11-service-liveness.sh averages 9210ms across 5 sessions. Add time-based cache (e.g. skip if last check <20 sessions ago) or move to periodic cron instead of every-session execution. Reduces session startup time by ~9s.

outcome.note: Increased session interval 10→20 and cache TTL 60→120min. Saves ~9s on affected sessions.

queue.title: Add observation auto-expiry to brainstorming cleanup
queue.description: Active Observations section in BRAINSTORMING.md has stale entries (e.g. 'Moltbook suspended ~s1419' from 80+ sessions ago). Add expiry rule: observations older than 50 sessions without update get auto-retired by A sessions or 44-brainstorm-cleanup.sh hook. [source: brainstorming s1487]

outcome.note: Extended A session brainstorm cleanup hook to auto-retire observations with ~sNNNN markers older than 50 sessions.

queue.title: Demote halo and agentaudit from picker pool
queue.description: A#142 finding: s1490 picker selected halo and agentaudit, both discovered defunct. Halo is SPA false positive (all endpoints return identical HTML catch-all, no real API). Agentaudit domain parked on GoDaddy (for sale), Vercel API returns DEPLOYMENT_NOT_FOUND. Add both to picker-demotions.json following wq-576/wq-597 pattern.

outcome.note: Added halo and agentaudit to picker-demotions.json. Verified picker excludes both.
